name: Alisher Khujanov
subject: Frontend and Backend Development
bio: 7+ yillik tajribaga ega frontend va backend dasturchi, zamonaviy UI/UX interfeyslarni yaratishda ustoz.

name: Sanjar
subject: Backend and Mobile Development
bio: Python va ma’lumotlar bazalarida professional mutaxassis, server taraf tizimlarni ishlab chiqishda yetakchi.

name: Akmaljon Ismoilov

bio: Python asosida avtomatlashtirish, web va data science loyihalarida ekspert.

Django va Flask bilan web-ilovalar yaratish

name: Muhammad Olimov
subject: Artificial Intelligence va Python
bio: AI va Machine Learning bo‘yicha yetakchi mutaxassis, innovatsion startaplar bilan ishlagan.
achievements: TensorFlow va PyTorch bilan amaliy tajriba

name: Rustam Abdullaev

name: Saida Iskandarova
